title: List of suicides
text:
Please note that this page may feel unpleasant and isn't recommended for everyone. If you know someone in crisis or you're looking for someone to talk to someone yourself, please contact Aasra's 24x7 Helpline at 91-22-27546669 or schedule an appointment with KGP's counseling center at (+91) 3222 283576.
This page lists the students who ended up taking their own lives while they were an active student on campus.

• Lokesh Meena (17th January, 2017) 3rd Year, Civil Engineering, RK Hall. [ 1 ]
• Satish Mandava (Februaruy, 2017) 4th year. [ 2 ]
• Sreeraj Sana (30th March, 2017) 3rd year, Electrical engineering, LLR Hall. [ 3 ]
• Nidhin N (Died 21st April, 2017 | Burial 24th April 2017, 5 pm at Haripad, Kerala) 4th year, Aerospace engineering (13AE30023), Nehru Hall. [ 4 ]
• Nikhil Bhatia (27th October, 2017) 4th year, VS Hall. [ 5 ]
• Gangireddy Hanimi Reddy(24th October, 2018), M.Tech 2nd year, MMM Hall. [ 6 ]
• Faizan Ahmed (14th October, 2022), 3rd year, Mechanical Engineering, LLR Hall. [ 7 ]
• K Kiran Chandra (October, 2023), 4th year, Electrical Engineering. [ 8 ]
• Devika Pillai (June, 2024), 3rd year, Biotechnology Engineering, SNIG Hall. [ 9 ]

• Shaon Malik (12th January, 2025), 3rd year, Electrical Engineering. [ 10 ]
• Aniket Walkar (20th April, 2025), 4th year, OENA, JCB Hall. [ 11 ]
• Md Asif Qamar (4th May 2025), 3rd year, Civil engineering. [ 12 ]
